case_address_found_2: 100 yards south of the Eagle St. Bridge
case_circumstances: Body was seen by people on a Cuyahoga River Cruise boat, the Goodtime II.  After the cruise, the man went to the site where he saw the body and then called police.
case_head_hair: Autopsy report states, "The head hair is blond and abundant."
case_eye_description: Autopsy report states, "The eyeballs are present," but does not specify color
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available

1 dress shirt, striped, long-sleeved white shirt with purple and blue/green stripes
1 pair pants, white with brown, blue, red plaid/checker pattern
1 white T-shirt undershirt
1 pr white socks

documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
